betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The power I may want to seek is a tricky one. Knowledge really, as it is knowledge that we are speaking of.
A knowledge that can destroy those who are not ready to face it. I am not ready, that much I know now.
The insights coming from the strange properies of this new fluix world is going to be quite useful.
I do not really know what this 'nightmare' is, but, for some reason, when I am in this place, I can intuit, mostly subconsciously, whether or not I am ready to face it, and I am not.
